oYknBA.en: Make a beautiful bouquet with snow flower to have memorable and loving winter~
oYknBA.pt: Make a beautiful bouquet with snow flower to have memorable and loving winter~

ooknBA.en:
[Winter]
You seems to be a bit weak for knowing elegance of snow flower. You must be able to fight  agains this freezing winter and control the weather for the festival which we recommend you to train more and comeback.
ooknBA.pt:
[Winter]
You seems to be a bit weak for knowing elegance of snow flower. You must be able to fight  agains this freezing winter and control the weather for the festival which we recommend you to train more and comeback.

[Winter]
Get yourself light and ease for this cold weather
o4knBA.pt:
[Winter]

pIknBA.en:
[Winter]
Hello! Thank you very much for joining today's snow flower festival!
pIknBA.pt:
[Winter]
Hello! Thank you very much for joining today's snow flower festival!

pYknBA.en:
[Winter]
Although winter is too cold, we always feel romantic atmosphere. fluffy snow, wood that makes burning sound in fire place, exchanging presents, colorful lights...
pYknBA.pt:
[Winter]
Although winter is too cold, we always feel romantic atmosphere. fluffy snow, wood that makes burning sound in fire place, exchanging presents, colorful lights...

poknBA.en:
[Winter]
Today is cold as hell like ordinary winter. We will be so happy if snow falls today. However, Aldebaran haven't had any snow in its history.
poknBA.pt:
[Winter]
Today is cold as hell like ordinary winter. We will be so happy if snow falls today. However, Aldebaran haven't had any snow in its history.

p4knBA.en: Wow, we still have snow flower festival?
p4knBA.pt: Wow, we still have snow flower festival?

qIknBA.en:
[Winter]
That's right! Snow flower festival without snow! Aldebaran is famous for it. The festival continues for celebrating special thanks for heroes and craving for snow.
qIknBA.pt:
[Winter]
That's right! Snow flower festival without snow! Aldebaran is famous for it. The festival continues for celebrating special thanks for heroes and craving for snow.

qYknBA.en:
[Winter]
Many visitors were awkward for attending snow flower festival without snow but it became one of the best winter festival known from all over the continent.
qYknBA.pt:
[Winter]
Many visitors were awkward for attending snow flower festival without snow but it became one of the best winter festival known from all over the continent.

[Winter]
In the festival, you can experience of making bouquet with snow flower like ^0000CDMake snow flower bouquet^000000.

[Winter]

[Winter]

[Winter]
Also, in hopes for waiting for snow,^9370DBFind for white cotton event^000000and ^9370DBWord card^000000 to exchange for special present that we prepared.

[Winter]
How is it? Will you join us for celebrating this snow flower festival? Are you ready to participate in Aldebaran snow flower festival?
rYknBA.pt:
[Winter]
How is it? Will you join us for celebrating this snow flower festival? Are you ready to participate in Aldebaran snow flower festival?

[Winter]
Then, I recommend for participating our main event by making ^9370DBSnow flower bouquet^000000. Making bouquet with snow flower best fits definition for enjoying the festival.

s4knBA.en:
[Winter]
Siromas disappear by leaving white crystal called snow flower which people from past started to raise Siromas craving for snow.
s4knBA.pt:
[Winter]
Siromas disappear by leaving white crystal called snow flower which people from past started to raise Siromas craving for snow.

tIknBA.en:
[Winter]
However, there were little knowledge about unknown creature which failed to raise them. In return, number of Siroma dramatically increased.
tIknBA.pt:
[Winter]
However, there were little knowledge about unknown creature which failed to raise them. In return, number of Siroma dramatically increased.

tYknBA.en:
[Winter]
At the right time, heroes emerged at once and defeated Siromas. The morning that countless Siromas disappeared from Aldebaran was left with endless snow flower that sparkled like real snow.
tYknBA.pt:
[Winter]
At the right time, heroes emerged at once and defeated Siromas. The morning that countless Siromas disappeared from Aldebaran was left with endless snow flower that sparkled like real snow.

[Winter]

toknBA.pt:

[Winter]
Collect snow flower that snow boys drop. Collect snow flower and return it for bouquet.

[Winter]

[Winter]

[Winter]

[Winter]
We make snowman to remember heroes who defeated Siromas in one night every year.
v4knBA.pt:
[Winter]

wIknBA.en:
[Winter]
Defeat Snow boy and collect ^0000CD10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers. This illusionist will celebrate this festival by making bouquet by banding snow flower together when you return collected snow flower.
wIknBA.pt:
[Winter]
Defeat Snow boy and collect ^9370DB10^000000 Magical Snow Flowers. This illusionist will celebrate this festival by making bouquet by banding snow flower together when you return collected snow flower.

[Winter]

wYknBA.pt:
[Winter]

[Winter]
Snow flower festival, the best winter festival in continent, started with craving for snow at first.
woknBA.pt:
[Winter]

w4knBA.en:
[Winter]
Different from Luti which snows for all year, Aldebaran people have done all effort to get snow artificially.
w4knBA.pt:
[Winter]
Different from Luti which snows for all year, Aldebaran people have done all effort to get snow artificially.

xIknBA.en:
[Winter]
They have tried by sprinkling grinded ice and using spells but all methods had side effects which instantly ended the tries.
xIknBA.pt:
[Winter]
They have tried by sprinkling grinded ice and using spells but all methods had side effects which instantly ended the tries.

xYknBA.en:
[Winter]
However, craving for snow never have been stopped and they started to import snow lie Siroma to raise them.
xYknBA.pt:
[Winter]
However, craving for snow never have been stopped and they started to import snow lie Siroma to raise them.

xoknBA.en:
[Winter]
Siroma population dramatically increased when they moved from severe cold cave to mild weather in Aldebaran.
xoknBA.pt:
[Winter]
Siroma population dramatically increased when they moved from severe cold cave to mild weather in Aldebaran.

x4knBA.en:
[Winter]
When raising farm was not able to fullfill all Siromas due to dramatic increase in number, they fled from the farm and ate everything they see.
x4knBA.pt:
[Winter]
When raising farm was not able to fullfill all Siromas due to dramatic increase in number, they fled from the farm and ate everything they see.

yIknBA.en:
[Winter]
People of Aldebaran encountered terror. They started to pack and started to fled from town due to white fear they've faced instantly.
yIknBA.pt:
[Winter]
People of Aldebaran encountered terror. They started to pack and started to fled from town due to white fear they've faced instantly.

yYknBA.en:
[Winter]
The day before fleeing from town...people were full of sorrow before deep sleep. And the next day... all people who came out from their door were surprised.
yYknBA.pt:
[Winter]
The day before fleeing from town...people were full of sorrow before deep sleep. And the next day... all people who came out from their door were surprised.

yoknBA.en:
[Winter]
All Siromas disappeared during the night. People tried to find them from all over the town but only white colored powder was on all over the road.
yoknBA.pt:
[Winter]
All Siromas disappeared during the night. People tried to find them from all over the town but only white colored powder was on all over the road.

y4knBA.en:
[Winter]
People were confused. All Siromas are gone in one night?? All secrets are revealed by some children.
y4knBA.pt:
[Winter]
People were confused. All Siromas are gone in one night?? All secrets are revealed by some children.

zIknBA.en:
[Winter]
Those children were very sad about leaving town with all memorable momments so they've gathered in old house's storage to talk about old memories all night.
zIknBA.pt:
[Winter]
Those children were very sad about leaving town with all memorable momments so they've gathered in old house's storage to talk about old memories all night.

zYknBA.en:
[Winter]
When the night started, there was short disturbance and Siroma's sound started to cutback. Children started to see outside through windown and crack between doors.
zYknBA.pt:
[Winter]
When the night started, there was short disturbance and Siroma's sound started to cutback. Children started to see outside through windown and crack between doors.

[Winter]

zoknBA.pt:
[Winter]

1YonBA.pt: You don't know the meaning of snowman for the residents of Aldebaran.

14onBA.en: Let's go to catch the snow boys. I have to farm magical snow flowers!
14onBA.pt: Let's go to catch the snow boys. I have to farm magical snow flowers!

2oonBA.en: I should take a break before I packing these cotton. Where is my ice candy?
2oonBA.pt: I should take a break before I packing these cotton. Where is my ice candy?

24onBA.en: The quality of warm cotton is quite nice this year! Every sheep must be well-nourished.
24onBA.pt: The quality of warm cotton is quite nice this year! Every sheep must be well-nourished.

3oonBA.en: No! Don't take any hair from my cuttie! This sheep is one of my family!!!
3oonBA.pt: No! Don't take any hair from my cuttie! This sheep is one of my family!!!

4IonBA.en: Let's run for snow flower kids next year.

4oonBA.en: This hat is really warm and pretty! Why don't we commercialize this?

44onBA.en: This is festival gift. We are not supposed to sell it.

5YonBA.en: It looks like I need more gift boxes.

5oonBA.en: How many gift boxes do I need to prepare more?

6YonBA.en: Does anyone want to exchange X for A?
6YonBA.pt: Does anyone want to exchange X for A?

64onBA.en: W card, got it. I card, T card... NO!!! I don't have R card! Please sell me R card!

7YonBA.en: Wow~ It really looks like snowing!

8IonBA.en: I'm begging for cards... Please show your mercy on me...
